title: Sun Life Mutual Fund Account Opening Form

sections.title: Section A – Account Type and Name

fields.label: Type of Account
fields.summary: Tick one: • Individual • Joint AND • Joint OR • In-Trust-For (ITF).

fields.label: Complete Account Name (for Joint)
fields.summary: Write the account name in full following sequence of investors.

fields.label: Name of Minor (if ITF)
fields.summary: Write minor’s full name (attach PSA Birth Certificate or Passport).

fields.label: Name of Principal Investor
fields.summary: Write Last Name, First Name, Middle Name, Suffix, and any Other Legal Name.

fields.label: Permanent Home Address
fields.summary: Write full permanent address (no P.O. Box).

fields.label: ZIP Code (Permanent)
fields.summary: Write ZIP code.

fields.label: Present Home Address
fields.summary: Write current address (tick if same as permanent).

fields.label: ZIP Code (Present)
fields.summary: Write ZIP code.

fields.label: Mobile Number
fields.summary: Write 10-digit mobile number with country code.

fields.label: Birthdate
fields.summary: Write in DD-MMM-YYYY (e.g., 14-MAY-2024).

fields.label: Citizenship/Nationality
fields.summary: Write citizenship(s).

fields.label: Business/Work Phone
fields.summary: Write work phone number.

fields.label: Home Phone
fields.summary: Write home phone number.

fields.label: Birthplace
fields.summary: Write City, Province/State, Country.

fields.label: Email Address
fields.summary: Write valid email address.

fields.label: Sex (at birth)
fields.summary: Tick Male or Female.

fields.label: Civil Status
fields.summary: Tick one: Single, Married, Common Law, Separated, Widowed.

fields.label: Occupation
fields.summary: Write occupation.

fields.label: Nature of Business/Work
fields.summary: Describe business/work nature.

fields.label: Name of Employer/Business
fields.summary: Write employer or business name.

fields.label: Gross Annual Income
fields.summary: Write annual income.

fields.label: Work Address
fields.summary: Write complete work address (no P.O. Box).

fields.label: ZIP Code (Work)
fields.summary: Write ZIP code.

fields.label: Preferred Mailing Address
fields.summary: Tick Permanent, Present, or Work address.

fields.label: SSS/GSIS No.
fields.summary: Write government ID number if applicable.

fields.label: Philippine TIN
fields.summary: Write Tax Identification Number (mandatory for income-paying fund).

fields.label: ID Presented
fields.summary: Write ID type from checklist.

fields.label: ID Number
fields.summary: Write ID number.

fields.label: ID Expiry Date
fields.summary: Write date of expiry (DD-MMM-YYYY).

fields.label: Are you a U.S. Person?
fields.summary: Tick Yes/No. If Yes, provide U.S. TIN (SSN, EIN, or ITIN).

fields.label: Politically Exposed Person (PEP)?
fields.summary: Tick Yes/No. If Yes, provide Name(s), Relationship(s), Agency/Position(s).

fields.label: Source of Funds
fields.summary: Tick all applicable: • Sale of Assets • Time Deposits/Mutual Funds • Allowance/Donation/Remittances • Business Income • Rentals • Commissions/Professional Fees • Inheritance • Salaries/Bonuses/Retirement/Pension • Pre-need/Insurance Proceeds • Other (specify).

fields.label: Third Party/Beneficial Owner?
fields.summary: Tick Yes/No. If Yes, provide details (Name, Relationship, Address, Birthdate, Citizenship, Occupation, Contact Nos., TIN). For Entities: provide Entity Name, Relationship, Type, Nature of Business, Country of Incorporation, TIN, Date of Incorporation.

fields.label: Liquidity (Q51)
fields.summary: Select % of assets for this investment: • <5% • 5–15% • 16–25% • 26–35% • >35%.

fields.label: Investment Objective (Q52)
fields.summary: Tick one: • Capital Preservation • Regular Income • Income & Growth • Capital Growth • Capital Appreciation.

fields.label: Investment Horizon (Q53)
fields.summary: Select holding period: • <1 year • 1–2 years • 3–5 years • 6–10 years • >10 years.

fields.label: Knowledge (Q54)
fields.summary: Tick knowledge level: • None • Limited • Moderate • Good • Extensive.

fields.label: Experience (Q55)
fields.summary: Select experience in years: • None • <1 year • 1–5 years • 6–10 years • >10 years.

fields.label: Risk Tolerance (Q56)
fields.summary: Tick % willing to put in higher-risk: • <20% • 21–40% • 41–60% • 61–80% • >80%.

fields.label: Financial Situation (Q57)
fields.summary: Tick one: • Need investment to supplement income • May need investment soon • Need only for emergency • Stable with sufficient cash flow • Completely secure.

fields.label: Suitability Waiver (Q58–59)
fields.summary: If investing more aggressively than profile, tick waiver and state reason.

fields.label: Fund Name (1–3)
fields.summary: Write chosen Sun Life Fund(s).

fields.label: Sales Load Option
fields.summary: Tick Front-End, Back-End, or Others.

fields.label: Investment Amount
fields.summary: Write amount in PHP or USD and amount in words.

fields.label: Payment Details
fields.summary: Tick and fill: • Cash • Check (No./Bank) • Direct Deposit/Bank Transfer • Transfer from Sun Life Insurance/Plan (policy no.) • Telegraphic Transfer • Prosperity Card (no.) • Others (specify).

fields.label: Settlement Bank Account (PHP)
fields.summary: Write Bank Name, Account Name, Account Number (SA/CA).

fields.label: Settlement Bank Account (USD)
fields.summary: Write Bank Name, Account Name, Account Number (SA/CA).

fields.label: Proof of Bank Ownership
fields.summary: Attach one: Bank Statement, Certificate of Deposit, Passbook, ATM Card, Machine-validated Deposit/Withdrawal Slip, or Check.

sections.title: Section G – Reduced Sales Load Option

fields.label: Lower Front-End Sales Load
fields.summary: If you and related accounts have ≥ PHP100,000, you may apply. Write related account names, relationships, and account numbers.

fields.label: Read Terms and Conditions
fields.summary: Review Fund policies, redemption, fees, liability, privacy, AMLA, FATCA, and your rights before signing.

fields.label: Printed Name & Signature of Principal Investor
fields.summary: Sign above printed name.

fields.label: Date Signed
fields.summary: Write MM/DD/YYYY.

fields.label: Printed Name & Signature of Co-Investor(s)
fields.summary: Each co-investor signs above printed name.

fields.label: Date Signed (per co-investor)
fields.summary: Write MM/DD/YYYY.

sections.title: Section J – For MF Representative / Broker Use Only

fields.label: Recommended Fund(s)
fields.summary: MF Rep writes recommended funds.

fields.label: Selected Fund(s)
fields.summary: Write investor’s selected fund(s).

fields.label: Mode of KYC
fields.summary: Tick: • In-person • Remote/video.

fields.label: Remarks
fields.summary: MF Rep notes any remarks or special handling.

fields.label: Printed Name & Signature of MF Rep/Broker
fields.summary: Sign above printed name.

fields.label: A.R. No., Rep Code, Branch, Lead Conversion No.
fields.summary: Write details as applicable.

fields.label: Date & Time Received
fields.summary: Write date (DD-MMM-YYYY) and time received.

fields.label: Receiving Department/Office
fields.summary: Write department/office name.
